name: domspace
description: Adjust the text nodes in an HTML DOM so that the document is pretty-printed when serialized

scripts.coverage: NODE_ENV=development nyc --reporter=lcov --reporter=text --all -- mocha && echo google-chrome coverage/lcov-report/index.html
scripts.travis: npm test && npm run coverage && (<coverage/lcov.info coveralls || true)

author: Andreas Lind <andreaslindpetersen@gmail.com>
